PlayAnimation(String, Boolean)

Plays an animation, specified by name. If an animation cannot be found with the name, nothing happens.

Declaration
public void PlayAnimation(string animName, bool resetPrevious = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String animName

The name of the animation to play.
System.Boolean resetPrevious

If true, resets the previous animation that was playing, if any. This will also reset its speed.
